name: Terra Marketing Group
overview:
Terra Marketing Group was launched in 2009 as a leading Canadian Internet marketing company. Since then, it has been growing quickly. The company currently has more than 250 employees and participates in markets around the world, including Canada, the United States, the UK, Australia and New Zealand. Terra Marketing Group is dedicated to looking at existing market places and finding ways to improve the products and services currently being offered. It does not try and profit by creating new products or services, rather TMG tries to capitalize and improve on what is already out there. There will always be newly emerging markets in the online industry, and therefore the chance to improve existing products and aggressively market them. Despite the ever changing online industry, Terra Marketing Group is a company committed to high values and outstanding ethical conduct.

Statement of Purpose:

“Terra Marketing Group will strive to create online products and services that serve the community. We will deal honestly and ethically with each business decision we make. We will only create websites and e-commerce efforts that enhance the lives of our customers. By doing so we will help raise the standard of online commerce, while generating loyalty, repeat business and trust that will help us continue to grow our profit potential for years to come.”
